# Utho.com Object Storage NPM Plugin

This project is an npm plugin for integrating with Utho.com Object Storage services.

## Project Structure
- TypeScript-based Node.js package
- Object Storage API client implementation
- Comprehensive testing with Jest
- Full TypeScript type definitions
- ESM and CommonJS support

## Development Guidelines
- Follow TypeScript best practices
- Maintain comprehensive test coverage
- Use semantic versioning
- Include proper error handling
- Document all public APIs

## API Implementation
- Bucket operations (create, delete, list)
- Object operations (upload, download, delete, list)
- Authentication and authorization
- Error handling and retry logic
- Progress tracking for uploads

## Testing Requirements
- Unit tests for all methods
- Integration tests with mock responses
- Error scenario testing
- Type checking validation
